column1: Processing Stage  Input  Output  Key Operations
Data Collection  CSV + GCS URLs  103 audio files + JSONs  gcloud CLI download
Audio Processing  WAV files  80channel logMel (16 kHz)  Resampling
Text Processing  Hindi JSON transcripts  Token IDs  Unicode NFC normalization
Augmentation  Original audio  Augmented samples (70%)  Speed (±15%)
Train/Val Split  103 samples  87 train / 16 val  Stratified 85/15 split
Batching  Variablelength samples  Padded tensors  Dynamic padding
